tccc.entry.horse_armor_improvements.hint: These armor pieces for your equine friends are now more useful.
tccc.entry.horse_armor_improvements.page: Horse armor is now craftable, and can also be enchanted with all protection enchantments, Frost Walker, Feather Falling, Soul Speed, Depth Strider, and Thorns. It no longer spawns in as many loot tables, reducing inventory clutter.
The diamond horse armor recipe. Replace the diamonds for the type of horse armor you want.
